> <OLD>
>
> Talon: Talon nodded and said "It's understable that all are a little...
> stressed. "said sadly Talon"Situation is very bad; we should better go with
> her" Talon walked slowly towards the exit.

<NEW>

For a moment there was only stone cold silence from LEO as he watched
events take place. WHEELIE leaving the room, the blow up on TUSCON's
part and then the rest leaving as well, anger the prevelent emotion in
everyone it seemed.

With an inordinate amount of care LEO reached down and activated the
comlink between himself and TUSCON. "Sir." he said with an extreme
amount of calm in his voice. "I call you that because you are the
commander of this field position." It was obvious that LEO was making
an attempt to remind TUSCON of what he was and his responsibilities.

LEO PRIME paused for a moment, taking the time to be sure his own calm
was still in place. "A soldier under your command has gone off in an
attempt to recover Rodimus Prime on his own." Of course LEO was
refering to WHEELIE.

"You have told me that you revere Optimus Prime." LEO straighted but
still talked into the comlink, "Optimus Prime was betrayed by one that
he called a brother and yet he still carried on." (Animated Optimus
Prime betrayed by Sentinal Prime) "And what of the original Optimus
Prime? How many times times did he try to reason with those who were
his arch enemies?" (G1 Optimus Prime reasoning with the Megatron)

"Have you written Wheelie off so soon and letting him go to what is
most certainly his doom or will you attempt to reign him in?" LEO
paused to ask his last questions, "What would any of the Optimus
Prime's have done? What would any leader do? What will you do Tuscon
Prime?"

(TAG)

Preston
